name: Watch Out, it's a Pitfall!
description:
Hidden in the Canelones country, the treasure of Brian awaits being collected.

Be the first explorer in the world to collect the real treasure of Brian, his golden statues, in this exiting and explorative game inspired by Pitfall for the Atari 2600!

But...watch out! It's a pitfall!

Made in 72 hours by a solo developer.
